Title: Microsoft Teams: Preview Changes Before Sending Live in 'Manage what attendees see'
Description:
Following further review, this feature started rolling out in July 2025. We apologize for any inconvenience. An enhancement to the 'Manage what attendees see' feature, allowing organizers and presenters to preview changes to what is brought on or off the screen before sending them live to attendees. This capability is only available for Town hall.
GA date: July CY2025
